title: I swear to god... TWC is trash
body: I've been without Internet for 3 days now. I'm being charged for 15 mbps, I'm only getting .36 mbps. Everyday this happens.  I unplug and replug the fucking router like they tell me everytime, and it doesn't work. Automatically they assume it's a router problem. I return this shit, get a new one, still problems. I call them, they said they don't know what to do and the call "drops". Are you fucking serious? I'm really angry and upset right now.
